text:
I have installed .msi version, but it appears that I need older one, so I uninstalled this one, but Tomcat 7 service left and now I don't know how to remove it from Services. Is there any solution? 

I tried with creating resource path which service shows in properties and with service.bat remove, but that doesn't work for me.
